statements: DELETE FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
DELETE FROM route_optimization WHERE congestion_prediction = 'Low traffic';
DELETE FROM route_optimization WHERE congestion_prediction = 'High' AND suggested_speed < 50;
DELETE FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location='Downtown' AND congestion_level='High';
DELETE FROM route_optimization WHERE start_location='City Center' AND end_location='Airport';
DELETE FROM route_optimization WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
DELETE FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM congestion_data WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND route_id = 5;
DELETE FROM congestion_data WHERE route_id = 1 AND vehicle_id = 5;
